bill.title: Let Everyone Get Involved in Opportunities for National Service Act
bill.description: Authorizes The American Legion to expand membership eligibility to include veterans and service members who served during times that were not designated periods of war. Currently, only veterans and service members who served during periods of time specified by Congress are eligible to join The American Legion.

history.action: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E276)
Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.
